spells.name: Freedom
spells.description: Releases creature from imprisonment.

spells.name: Imprisonment
spells.description: Entombs subject beneath the earth.

spells.name: Mage's Disjunction
spells.description: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

spells.name: Prismatic Sphere
spells.description: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

spells.name: Gate
spells.description: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: Alters item to transport its possessor to your abode.

spells.name: Summon Monster IX
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Teleportation Circle
spells.description: Teleports creatures inside circle.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.description: "Sixth sense" warns of impending danger.

spells.name: Dominate Monster
spells.description: As dominate person, but any creature.

spells.name: Hold Monster, Mass
spells.description: As hold monster, but all within 30 ft.

spells.name: Power Word Kill
spells.description: Kills one creature with 100 hp or less.

spells.name: Crushing Hand
spells.description: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.

spells.name: Meteor Swarm
spells.description: Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Shades
spells.description: As shadow conjuration, but up to 8th level and 80% real.

spells.name: Weird
spells.description: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

spells.name: Astral Projection
spells.description: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

spells.name: Energy Drain
spells.description: Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

spells.name: Soul Bind
spells.description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

spells.name: Wail of the Banshee
spells.description: Deals 10 damage/level to 1 creature/level.

spells.name: Etherealness
spells.description: Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

spells.name: Shapechange
spells.description: Transforms you into certain creatures, and lets you change forms once per round.

spells.name: Time Stop
spells.description: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.
